Object Parameters: Delay before the second (groups) truck spawns (time in frames)
Delay until the first (groups) truck spawns (time in frames)

0 = collision, allows for effects/animations and spawns 12 groups of trucks.
1 = No collision, loads _LOD model instead and limits to 3 TruckWagons on a route.
Description:
Truck from Wario's Gold Mine.
[[KMP (File Format)#POTI|Route Setting 1]] changes the speed (if 0 it uses the speed setting in S1).
[[KMP (File Format)#POTI|Route Setting 2]]: 0x0: Normal behavior
0x1: Truck sways left and right harder and wont change back until the end of the route.
0x2: Truck sways left and right.
